mapper.insert: INSERT INTO a_process_modeling(process_name, product, remark, power_consumption, process_description, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{processName}, #{product}, #{remark}, #{powerConsumption}, #{processDescription}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select:
SELECT a.process_id, a.process_name, a.product, f.product_model AS model, -- 从 a_factory_modeling 获取 model f.product_specification AS specification, -- 从 a_factory_modeling 获取 specification f.product_unit AS unit, -- 从 a_factory_modeling 获取 unit a.power_consumption, a.remark, a.created_at, a.updated_at, a.process_description FROM a_process_modeling a LEFT JOIN a_factory_modeling f ON a.product = f.product
AND a.process_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
ORDER BY a.process_id
